name: Oxford Lane Capital Corp.
description: Oxford Lane Capital Corp. is a publicly traded closed-end management investment company based in the United States. The company primarily focuses on acquiring and managing a portfolio of senior secured loans and other debt instruments issued by private middle-market companies. Established in 2010, Oxford Lane is known for its strategic investments that aim to generate income and capital appreciation for its shareholders. The firm utilizes a research-driven approach, leveraging the expertise of its management team to assess market trends and identify attractive investment opportunities. With a commitment to delivering consistent returns, Oxford Lane has positioned itself as a prominent player in the business development company (BDC) sector. The company is actively involved in the management of collateralized loan obligations (CLOs), which are financial instruments that pool together loans and debt obligations to create a diversified investment vehicle. Oxford Lane is dedicated to transparency and shareholder value, providing regular updates and insights into its investment strategies and performance. As the demand for alternative investment opportunities grows, Oxford Lane Capital Corp. continues to adapt its focus toward generating sustainable income streams while navigating the complexities of the financial markets.

seo.meta_title: Oxford Lane Capital Corp. | Investment Management and Income Generation
seo.meta_description: Discover Oxford Lane Capital Corp., a leading closed-end management investment company focused on generating income through strategic investments in secured loans and CLOs.

faq.question: What is Oxford Lane Capital known for?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital is known for its investments in senior secured loans and collateralized loan obligations (CLOs).

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Oxford Lane Capital?
faq.answer: William J. Dwyer is the CEO of Oxford Lane Capital Corp.

faq.question: Where is Oxford Lane Capital headquartered?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Oxford Lane Capital offer?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital primarily offers investment products focused on senior secured loans and CLOs.

faq.question: When was Oxford Lane Capital founded?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital was founded in 2010.
